name: Pop Top Bubbles
description:
Fun Challenging Bubble game, simple and easy to play but hard to master
Select Diffeclty of the game depend on your mode, to play from easy to extreme
Objective of the game is to clear the same colour bubbles
Each level has a target to atchive the more bubbles you clear in single move the more score you get, clear all matching bubbles to move to next level,
Use the magic Bubble, double tap any bubble and you chose the colour you like to change it too
Have Fun
